title: Kicked off for Unauthenticated server
body: I just recently got kicked off for Unauthenticated server and it wouldn't let me log into the game and now they put me on leave buster and I got 20-minute queues that I had no control over.....

replies.body:
I'm not exactly sure what you mean by unauthenticated server, if possible could you shoot us a screenshot of that specific error in case this is a new issue?

Overall, it sounds like your network was having problems staying connected to the game servers. Most of the time these issues can be fixed by adjusting your DNS server settings to go to Google first (8.8.8.8 & 8.8.4.4) and updating your port forwarding to make sure our connections can get through easily. If you aren't sure how to update those two settings check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
